channel.title: CVE Feed for ravanh -- Skype Legacy Buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ravanh -- Skype Legacy Buttons

item.title: CVE-2023-5615|2024-08-02T08:07:32.533Z -- ravanh -- skype%20legacy%20buttons
item.description: The Skype Legacy Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'skype-status' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
